Examples

Example 1: Show icons for each value in datasets

You can visualise a dataset with icons.


<div id="icon_example1" swa="Icon FROM exampledata_list"></div>

Example 2: Show only icons for the "mimetype" attributes

You can choose which attribute of an dataset should be visualised.


<div id="icon_example2" swa="Icon FROM exampledata_list"></div>
        

icon_example2_options = {
    showAttributes: ['mimetype']
};

Example 3: Show only icons with larger dimensions


<div id="icon_example3" swa="Icon FROM exampledata_list"></div>
        

icon_example3_options = {
    iconsHeight: '100px',
    iconsWidth: '100px'
};
